details.display-value: The Vestri Corp jacket is fully customized and uniquely styled. 94% polyester 6% elastane, this jacket has the front 'T' embroidered on left chest and 'VESTRI' embroidered across the back. Center front closure with storm flap. Custom logo 'T' zipper pulls, zip chest pocket with bonded tape styling. Adjustable drawstring system at hem, MP3 cord holder and inside pocket.
details.name: summary
